skeme: verse 1: i feel lost in this tragic altercation i need some rest laid back in this lovely vacation possessed in my mind possessed in the time lord forgive me feed me some of your wine im sorry for committing this fuming crime i wish i can take my soul back in a quick second only thing i look forward to is paradise in heaven now im raging with all the bullshit but bullshit is the shit i tend to not fuck with now im blowing all this piff in the face of the devil i hope i dont become a full time blown out full man rebel man i hate this decision on so many levels dont the man below ever temp you im telling you like..  verse 2: man below calling my name im trying to remain sane i feel like im being held down with burning chains a brave hearted individual feeling so uncharted lost ever since the news came my creator had departed this planet that we inhibit as i lay deep in thoughts i hear whispers sending chills down my spine at times i take actions which are not mine i tell myself that were our own gods no need for a higher power man-made towers hand planted flowers cold showers wash down my sins but at times money becomes my fascination lost in my own mind being held under self-encarceration
